=======
CHANGES
=======

3.4.3 (2007-11-01)
------------------

- Removed unused imports.

- Resolve ``ZopeSecurityPolicy`` deprecation warning.


3.4.2 (2007-09-26)
------------------

- Added missing files to egg distribution.

3.4.1 (2007-09-26)
------------------

- Added missing files to egg distribution.


3.4.0 (2007-09-25)
------------------

- Initial documented release.

- Reflect changes form ``zope.app.error`` refactoring.
